comments.body:
Can this be named Squared Error?  ("least" is not really needed.)
Also, can the doc include a mathematical statement of the form of the error?

comments.body: I am making an attempt to add a mathematical statement. Let me know if we need to be more descriptive. I plan to be more formal in the actual documentation.
